content_html: Chandrapur (Rautahat), Sept 12: The District Administration Office, Rautahat has enforced prohibitory order and curfew in the district up to Saturday morning. Chief District Officer Binod Kumar Khadka issuing a notice this morning has informed that the prohibitory order has been in force from 6.00 am

title: DAO Rautahat issues prohibitory order and curfew up to Saturday morning
